entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend and classmate, who is looking terrified when she sees the diary.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is taunting Harry with the diary.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a school prefect who tries to intervene in the situation between Harry and Malfoy.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who had previously disarmed Lockhart.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is a teacher at Hogwarts who was previously disarmed by Snape.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate, who catches the diary when it shoots out of Malfoy's hand.

relationships.description: Harry has his own diary, which is a source of trouble for him.
Malfoy is holding Harry's diary and taunting him with it.
Harry gets help from Ron when the diary shoots out of Malfoy's hand.
Percy scolds Harry for using magic in the corridors.
Malfoy teases Ginny after she passes him to enter her classroom.
